description: The protector of the first seal and next leader of the Yaso branch, he was Yura`s teacher and uses "Yousou Kioku", a blade he constructed to surpass Hidemoto`s blade. It possess him turning him into a demon to fight. He was defeated at the third seal and fought against the Keikain house at the second seal after being possessed by Minagoroshi Jizou who used the darkness in his heart to take over. He construct weapons for demons to use against barriers and is fighting Ryuuji, stating he always wanted to fight against him seeing as they both were candidates for leadership over the main family. He was purged by Yura and rescued by Ryuuji.
name: Keikain Akifusa
